# makeTransformer()

**Instance Method**

Creates a default-initialized fully-connected network multi-label classifier model suitable for incremental fitting.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeTransformer() -> FullyConnectedNetworkMultiLabelClassifierModel<Scalar, Label>
```
